players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I am the detective and I found Charlie is the mafioso"
Charlie: "I have no information to share at this time, but I urge everyone to remain calm and not jump to conclusions based on speculation."
Charlie: "I have always been loyal to our village and I urge everyone to trust each other during this investigation. Let's not rush to judgments or accuse anyone without solid evidence."
